title: Looking for Father Christmas? 28 of the UK's best festive events for families
text:
Some of the UK’s 2019 Christmas family events are spectacular enough to convert the grumpiest Scrooge, with plenty of fabulous venues practically drowning in fairylights and marshmallows. You may want to start booking now, as many of these will fill up fast.

1. Bletchley Park, Milton Keynes

There’s no rationing on fun as Father Christmas takes residence in Bletchley Park’s decorated library, a beautiful wood-panelled room used as an office by Codebreakers in World War Two. It’s decorated by vintage toys, decorations, 1940s greeting cards, Christmas trees and festive lights, and there are jovial crafting activities and a wintery park trail.

Nov 30-Dec 23; children £7.50, adults free with general admission ticket
